WorkItem.Description: WinRAR is reporting a CRC error that rawr.exe is corrupt.
WorkItem.Summary: Getting CRC Error expanding zip file

Comments.Message: The version on the site is working fine; sounds like your download was corrupt. Just redownload it?

Still getting it. Just updating, I'll try updating WinRAR:

!   C:\Users\Darryl\Downloads\Rawr v2.2.6(3).zip: CRC failed in Rawr v2.2.6\Rawr.exe. The file is corrupt
Nope still getting it. I've tried extracting with Windows instead of WinRAR as well.

I'm not sure what to tell you. Make sure when you redownload it, it's just not reusing the same temp file or something. I've tried it from several machines, including some using WinRAR, some using just standard Windows zip support, and it all works. It also seems to work for the over 7000 people who have downloaded it so far.

God knows, tried deleted temp folders, expanding folder and download folder and still getting it. 2.2.5 expands and works fine, please close this issue as you're right, Rawr is a popular program and no one else is getting this issue.

Just so strange.
